VARIABLES.NAME: text
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The text of the input, or the translation results if the input is from another language

VARIABLES.NAME: tags
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Array of Part-Of-Speech tags, this won't be returned if you use sentence_split

VARIABLES.NAME: sentences
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Array of Part-Of-Speech sentence splits, this will be returned if you use sentence_split
